price: 33. Qui tient meilleurs propos que celui qui appelle à Allah, fait le bien et dit : « Je suis du nombre des Soumis (Musulmans) ? »
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡلٗا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waman aḥsanu qawlan mimman daʿā ilā al-lahi waʿamila ṣāliḥan waqāla innanī mina al-mus'limīna
